Comments: ":math:`87` — for Mainnet. :math:`84` — for Testnet. :math:`83` — for Stagenet."
"First :math:`20` bytes of the result of the Keccak256 (Blake2b256 (publicKey)) hashing function. Here publicKey is the array of bytes of the account public key."

"First :math:`4` bytes of the result of the Keccak256 (Blake2b256 (data)) hashing function. Here data is the array of bytes of three fields put together: 1) Entity type. 2) Chain ID. 3) Account public key hash."
